sub_title: Assistant Professor at Eindhoven University of Technology
summary: I am biomedical engineer specialized in signal processing and analysis of medical images. The focus of my research is model-based quantitative analysis of medical images and biosignals, with application ranging from cancer imaging to perioperative risk monitoring and neuromuscular analysis. My main areas of expertise include signal processing, medical imaging, physiological modeling, bioelectronics, and bioinformatics. My career dream is to translate meaningful biomedical research into clinical practice.
